DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial evaluate effect tolterodine ER plus tamsulosin versus placebo patient perception overall treatment benefit men frequency urgency , without urinary urge incontinence ( UUI ) , without bladder outlet obstruction ( BOO ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Safety Of Detrol LA In Men With Overactive Bladder Symptoms With Or Without Bladder Outlet Obstruction
DOC.criteria: Male 40 year age Clinical sign symptom frequency urgency , without UUI , without BOO , least three month Mean urinary frequency 8 micturitions/24h verify Screening micturition diary Postvoid residual urine volume ( PVR ) > 200 ml measure ultrasound Maximum urinary flow rate ( Qmax ) < 5 ml/second measure flowmeter ; void volume 75 ml require order accurately record Qmax Prescribed administer antimuscarinic antispasmodic within 1 month Prescribed administer a1adrenergic antagonist within 2 week
